title.rendered: Special Asset Assistant – Part-Time | Tulsa, OK

content.rendered:
Special Assets Assistant | Tulsa, Oklahoma
  • Part-time, 15-20 hours a week
  • Will assist Credit Analyst as needed
  • Must have 12+ college credit hours of accounting
  • Must be familiar with tax returns and other financial statements
  • Position would be for an accounting major
